name: Kangaroo's Kooky "K" Quiz / Test | Alphabetics | 10 Questions

questions.text: Complete this line said by Mr. Miyagi: "___________ is for defense only."
questions.explanation:
Karate.

	Mr. Miyagi was played by Pat Morita. Mr. Miyagi was Daniel's karate teacher and friend in the "Karate Kid" movies.

questions.text: Who was the lead character in "The Wonder Years"?
questions.explanation:
Kevin.

	Kevin Arnold was played by Fred Savage. His younger brother Ben Savage was in "Boy Meets World". He played Corey.

questions.text: What company makes "Cheese and Macaroni", using that word order in the US because they claim they are the "cheesiest macaroni"?
I was born on 27 June 1880. I graduated cum laude with honors in German. I died 1 June 1968. Who am I?
questions.explanation:
Keller, Helen.

	Helen Keller was born in Alabama. She was really sick as a very young child and the fever left her blind and deaf. Many people consider her nothing more than a wild animal, however her mother refused to have her locked up. With the help of Ann Sullivan, her teacher, she became a famous orator giving speeches around the world, as well as becoming an author of many books.

questions.text: In 1985, who became the youngest World Chess Champion at 22?
questions.explanation:
Kasparov.

	Garry Kasparov is from Baku in Azerbaijan, which used to be part of the USSR.

questions.text: What is Ralph's last name in "The Honeymooners"?
questions.explanation:
Kramden.

	Ralph Kramden was played by Jackie Gleason.

questions.text: Who did Patrick Ewing play most of his professional career with?
questions.explanation:
Knicks & New York Knicks & Knickerbockers.

	Patrick Ewing was number 33 on the New York Knicks. He finished up his career with number 6 on Orlando Magic.

questions.text: In the musical,"The Wizard of Oz" where is Dorothy Gale from?
questions.explanation:
Kansas.

	Dorothy Gale was played by Judy Garland in the MGM movie version. The book "The Wizard of Oz" was written by L. Frank Baum.

questions.text: What is a baby goat called?
questions.explanation:
kid.

	The gestation period of a goat is about 5 months.

questions.text: What was the name of the Gorilla who learned sign language?
questions.explanation:
Koko.

	Koko had a vocabulary of over 1000 signs. One of her favorite signs, of course, was "gorilla".
